parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **1** to **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the NLB instance.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~443657~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the server group belongs.

parameters.name: ServerGroupIds
parameters.description: The server group ID. You can specify up to 20 server group IDs in each call.

parameters.name: ServerGroupNames
parameters.description: The names of the server groups to be queried. You can specify up to 20 names in each call.

parameters.name: ServerGroupType
parameters.description:
The type of server group. Valid values:

*   **Instance** : allows you to add servers of the **Ecs**, **Ens**, and **Eci** types.
*   **Ip**: allows you to add servers by specifying IP addresses.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) to which the server group belongs.
